shipping Coasts !!!

{{ shipping.type }} {{ shipping.price }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { CartService } from '../cart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-shipping', templateUrl: './shipping.component.html', styleUrls: ['./shipping.component.css'] }) export class ShippingComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private cartService: CartService) { } shippingCoasts!: Observable<{ type: string, price: number }>; ngOnInit(): void { this.shippingCoasts = this.cartService.getShippingPrices(); } }
